response.message:
Awesome job guys. I hope to see more of the careers product as time goes on and it would be great to roll it out to serverfault and other communities. Hint hint ;)

Oh and if anyone's wondering, hired twice through SO careers.

This looks pretty slick! I agree with @Ninefingers above that a Server Fault version of this would be very helpful. My firm had to look through the list of top users on SF manually in the hopes of finding someone who looked interested in a new job. Needless to say, that didn't pan out.

Also, I notice the search criteria include skill and location, but not industry. It would be very helpful if I could narrow the C++ candidates in New York to those who have experience in---or at least are explicitly interested in---the finance industry.

Oh and if anyone’s wondering,  I was hired for my current job through SO Careers.
Looks good. Let us hope it will finally properly kick off... There are rather few job offers outside the US at the moment.
